member.name: TS_TEXTCHANGE
member.summary: The TS_TEXTCHANGE structure contains text change data.

member.name: TS_TEXTCHANGE.acpStart
member.summary: Contains the starting character position of the change.

member.name: TS_TEXTCHANGE.acpOldEnd
member.summary: Contains the ending character position before the text is changed.

member.name: TS_TEXTCHANGE.acpNewEnd
member.summary: Contains the ending character position after the text is changed.
